attributes.action: Reintroduce the death penalty for all acts that result in the taking of a life once the act has been proved without a shadow of a doubt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the death penalty should be reintroduced for acts of terrorism leading to the taking of life, murders, stabbings. these acts have been planned and the perpetrators should be prepared to forfeit their own lives.
